params.text:
• Apply supplemental irrigation based on soil moisture and general appearance of the plants.

  • Irrigate at a weekly interval until fruit setting during dry season. Irrigate unmulched tomato every 10-14 days interval and mulched tomato every 10-14 days.

  • Water as the need arises during wet season.

params.question: During dry season, irrigation should be more frequent until the crop had started fruit setting.
